attributes.action: Ask the prime mininster to make it illegal to use fireworks at home at any time of year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It should be made law that to view fireworks,you should have to go to a properly orgainised display, which holds the relevant safety certificates.And that these displays should only be held on the 5th of november and new years eve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
